testcase.classname: Launch the app and download given Newspapser edition and Read though it.
testcase.name: Scenario 1: Verify the Newspaper edition is downloadable.
testcase.system-out: Given User launched Mail+ application.......................................passed When On Newspaper tab, scroll down to Recent issues and scroll right and tap on 'SEE MORE' button.passed And On Archive tab, tap to download Sept "24" edition.......................passed And On the paywall carousel, sign with credential provided..................passed Then Wait for the edition to download completed.............................passed

testcase.classname: Launch the app and download given Newspapser edition and Read though it.
testcase.name: Scenario 2: Verify the Images on Gallery section.
testcase.system-out: Given User is On the downloaded Sept 24 edition.............................passed When Navigate to Page "13" on PDF view that displays "Every One's Talking about " story (Page 13).passed And Tap on the Image Gallery is displayed on top of the page................passed And Now tap on camera icon to open full screen and traverse through all gallery images.passed Then On last image close the image by clicking on Close button to return to ALB (Article Light Box).passed
